overview: Starring popular sexy actress Nana Ninomiya, this drama depicts the legendary mahjong family's search for a son-in-law. Aoi Murasame, a college student whose parents are legendary sparrowmen. She had a weak lover, Shinji, who was weak in mahjong, but there is a tradition that the heir of the Murasame family must be a great sparrow master ...
title: Mahjong Soul
